title: 이병로
content:
한양대학교 서울캠퍼스
의과대학
의학과
안과학교실
교수이다.
학력
1986, 한양대학교, 의학사
1995, 한양대학교, 의학석사
1998, 한양대학교, 의학박사
연구실적
Time-periodic characteristics in the morphology of idiopathic central serous chorioretinopathy evaluated by volume scan using spectral-domain optical coherence tomography. Am J Ophthalmol. 2012 Aug;154(2):366-375.
Retro-mode Imaging for retinal pigment epithelium alterations in central serous chorioretinopathy.Am J Ophthalmol. 2012 Jul;154(1):155-163.
A Novel Noninvasive Detection Method for Retinal Nonperfusion Using Confocal Red-free Imaging. Ophthalmology. 2012 Jul;119(7):1447-54.
Choroidal thickness and volume mapping by a six radial scan protocol on spectral-domain optical coherence tomography. Ophthalmology. 2012 May;119(5):1017-23.
Novel noninvasive detection of the fovea avascular zone using confocal red-free imaging in diabetic retinopathy and retinal vein occlusion. Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci. 2012 Jan 25;53(1):309-15.
Overcoming segmentation errors in measurements of macular thickness made by spectral-domain optical coherence tomography. Retina. 2012 Mar;32(3):569-80.
수상
2015, 미국망막학회 2015년도 영예상(Honor Award) 수상
